summary: Technology Leader, Startup Enthusiast, Entrepreneur. Domain expert at IoT system architecture, scalable deployments, and sensor data analytics.- Co-founder of Teevr Data, an Industrial IOT company. Designed an algorithm to deliver 40x throughput from sensors to cloud by using machine learning driven adaptive compression technology.- Coauthor/filed for patents while working at Brocade.- Co-founder of TestGenie, a web/android app for Indian Test Prep Market (http://www.testgenie.com). Developed algorithms to personalize and improve results for students. Deployed solution on AWS cloud.- Developed software to convert C Algorithms to processor-based hardware by creating a pipeline of RISC processors to allow at-speed processing of an algorithm.Specialties: •	Time Series Machine Learning & digital signal processing.•	IoT system architecture.•	Compression Technologies.•	Time series Databases, Messaging Queues(MQTT, AMQP), and communication technologies.•       Web Programming, Architecture, Database Management (MYSQL), PHP, Apache. •	Amazon AWS deployment and performance improvements.•	ASIC Architect & designer•	Re-configurable computing, code optimization techniques, compiler level optimizations
